parts.name: Toyota Tundra 13WL / 13WE Brake Upgrade
parts.description: The front calipers from a 1st Gen Tundra (2000-2006) are a direct bolt-on upgrade for 3rd Gen 4Runners and 1st Gen Tacomas. The '13WL' casting (231mm) is the larger, more desirable version.

parts.name: FJ Cruiser / 5th Gen 4Runner Suspension on 4th Gen 4Runner
parts.description: Stock suspension (coils and shocks) from an FJ Cruiser or 5th Gen 4Runner fits directly onto a 4th Gen 4Runner. Since the FJ/5th Gen are heavier, this provides a cheap 1-inch lift and firmer ride for the 4th Gen.

parts.name: Tacoma Bed Swap (2nd Gen)
parts.description: Beds are interchangeable between 2nd Gen Tacomas (2005-2015) of the same length (5ft Short Bed vs 6ft Long Bed). The composite bed resists rust, but the tailgate skin can be damaged.
specs: 2012-2015 front clips can be swapped onto 2005-2011 trucks (requires hood, grille, headlights, bumper)

parts.name: Toyota E-Locker Retrofit
parts.description: The factory Electric Locking Differential (E-Locker) found in TRD Off-Road Tacomas and 4Runners can be retrofitted into non-locker axles. Requires modifying the axle housing (cutting/drilling/tapping) or swapping the entire axle assembly.
specs: Axle Swap is easier than housing modification

parts.name: 2UZ-FE Intake Manifold Swap (Tundra to GX470)
parts.description: The non-VVTi 2UZ-FE intake manifold (early Tundra/Land Cruiser) is sometimes swapped, but the more common mod is swapping the headers. Tundra headers (tubular) flow better than the log-style manifolds found on the GX470 / 4Runner V8.

parts.name: Tacoma / 4Runner Poly Steering Rack Bushings
parts.description: Stock rubber steering rack bushings on 1st Gen Tacomas and 3rd Gen 4Runners degrade, causing sloppy steering. Polyurethane bushings are a cheap and effective upgrade.

parts.name: Supra Turbo (Mk4) Brakes on SC300/SC400
parts.description: The legendary Mk4 Supra Turbo 4-piston front brakes are a direct bolt-on for the Lexus SC300 and SC400 (Z30 chassis).

parts.name: MR2 Spyder 2ZZ-GE Engine Swap
parts.description: The MR2 Spyder (ZZW30) came with the 1ZZ-FE. Swapping in the high-revving 2ZZ-GE (from Celica GTS or Lotus Elise) is the factory-style upgrade Toyota should have built. Mounts match, wiring requires modification.

parts.name: Corolla GT-S (AE86) Rear Axle Swap
parts.description: Swapping the disc brake, limited-slip rear axle from a Corolla GT-S (AE86) into a base model SR5 (drum brakes, open diff) is the standard drift upgrade.
specs: SR5 Axle: Drum brakes, Open diff

parts.name: 20R Head on 22R Block (Hybrid)
parts.description: Building a '20/22R Hybrid' involves putting the better-flowing cylinder head from an older 20R engine onto the larger displacement 22R block. Increases compression and flow.
